TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventHandler(object sender, ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs)
public delegate void ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 代表處理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例程式碼提供方法，以附加的事件處理常式事件，和將會收到新的元件的元件類型的名稱寫入的事件處理常式方法若要時所引發的事件處理常式時事件。The following example code provides a method that attaches an event handler for the event of a , and a event handler method that writes the name of the type of the component that is to receive the new component or components to the when the event handler is raised by a event. [!code-cpp[MoreEventHandlerExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MoreEventHandlerExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MoreEventHandlerExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]
